sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"包括，包含"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: contain, include, embrace, involve, comprehend, hold, comprise
means: contain ： 普通用词，所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西，也可指抽象无形的东西。
include ： 普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
embrace ： 正式用词，指把某事物纳入整个之中。
involve ： 把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的，不可触知的东西，多用作引申。
comprehend ： 正工用词，指包含在整体范围以内。
hold ： 常和contain换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
comprise ： 书面用词，暗指一个整体包括不同部分所组成，可与include交换使用。

sentence.Network_en: The unemployed executives include former sales managers, directors and accountants.
sentence.Network_cn: 被解雇的管理人员包括前销售经理、主管和会计。

sentence.Network_en: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

sentence.Network_en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)specifically exclude someone or something from a group or activity

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'shut in'): from Latin includere, from in- 'into' + claudere 'to shut'

encyclopedia.content: 定义 include()语句包含并运行指定文件。寻找包含文件 寻找包含文件的顺序先是在当前工作目录的相对的 include_path下寻找，然后是当前运行脚本所在目录相对的 include_path 下寻找。例如 include_path 是 .，当前工作目录是 /www/，脚本中要 include 一个 include/a.php 并且在该文件中有一句 include "b.php"，则寻找 b.php 的顺序先是 /www/，然后是 /www/include/。如果文件名以 ./ 或者 ../ 开始，则只在当前工作

entry.def: If one thing includes another thing, it has the other thing as one of its parts.

example.ex: A good British breakfast always includes sausages...
example.tran: 一顿丰盛的英式早餐总会包括香肠。

example.ex: The trip has been extended to include a few other events...
example.tran: 旅程被延长，其他几项活动也被包括进来。

entry.tran: 把…列为…的一部分;把…算入
entry.def: If someone or something is included in a large group, system, or area, they become a part of it or are considered a part of it.

example.ex: I had worked hard to be included in a project like this...
example.tran: 为参与这样的项目,我过去一直努力工作。

example.ex: The President is expected to include this idea in his education plan.
example.tran: 人们期望总统把这一意见列入他的教育计划当中。

means.word_mean: 1. have as a part, be made up out of;

sentences.sentence: "The list includes the names of many famous writers"
"I include you in the list of culprits"

means.word_mean: 3. add as part of something else; put in as part of a set, group, or category;

sentences.sentence: "We must include this chemical element in the group"

means.word_mean: 4. allow participation in or the right to be part of; permit to exercise the rights, functions, and responsibilities of;

sentences.sentence: "She was admitted to the New Jersey Bar"

stems_affixes.word_buile: conclude[[v.结论;终结]]男→adj.决定性的;结论性的
exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→adj.排外的, 孤高的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→n.排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
occlude[[v.闭塞,堵塞]]男稳荽省鷑.闭塞,堵塞
preclude[[v.妨碍;阻止]]→n.排除, 阻止
con全部+clud关闭+e→全部关掉→结束
oc一再+clude=clud关闭→一再关起来不畅通→堵塞
pre预先,提前+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
se分开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的

sentences.en: Their course of study includes elementary hygiene and medical theory.
sentences.cn: 他们的课程包括基础卫生学和医疗知识。

sentences.en: I include you in the list.

jushi.english: Other exhibits include precision instruments and chemical products.
jushi.chinese: 其他展品有精密仪器、化工产品等等。

jushi.english: The South China Sea Islands include more than 200 islands, sand cays, reefs and banks.
jushi.chinese: 我国南海诸岛包括200多个岛礁和沙滩。

jushi.english: Great Britain includes England,Scotland,Wales and Northern Ireland.
jushi.chinese: 大不列颠包括英格兰、苏格兰、威尔士和北爱尔兰。
